item.title: Bombardier and Austrian Federal Railways Sign Framework Agreement for up to 300 TALENT 3 Trains
item.description: [at noodls] - Rail technology leader Bombardier Transportation and the Austrian Federal Railways (ÖBB) have signed on December 27 a framework agreement covering the delivery of up to 300 BOMBARDIER TALENT 3 trains. ...

item.title: Embraer calls for industry limits on aircraft development funding
Embraer calls for industry limits on aircraft development funding
item.description: [Reuters] - Brazilian planemaker Embraer SA called on Tuesday for the aviation industry to set limits on state funding of aircraft development, a day after Brazil said it would challenge Canada over government support for rival Bombardier Inc. Embraer Chief Executive Paulo Cesar Silva said the aviation industry's standards for export financing by state banks had worked well to promote fair competition between Embraer, Bombardier and larger peers Boeing and Airbus.

item.title: Brazil WTO challenge of Canada 'necessary,' Embraer CEO says
item.description: [Reuters] - Brazil's challenge of Canadian state support for Bombardier Inc at the World Trade Organization is "necessary," the chief executive of Embraer SA said on Tuesday. Brazil said on Monday it had ...
